execution_plan.description: Find product ids of goods that are Tarts with apple flavor.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE LOWER(food) = 'tarts' AND LOWER(flavor) = 'apple';

execution_plan.description: Get receipts that include the goods found in step 1 (items referencing those product ids).
execution_plan.query: SELECT Receipt, Ordinal, Item FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);

execution_plan.description: Get customer IDs from receipts for the receipt numbers found in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber, CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.Receipt);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve customer names for the customer IDs found in step 3.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id, firstname, lastname FROM customers WHERE id IN ($step3.CustomerId);
